fields.description:
The state transition for loading static properties entries (STATIC_PROPERTIES_ADD) also calls {{prop.getValue()}} which attempts to create a transaction.  

During a database sync this is bad.  The result can be services which linger in unusable states because of this transition failing.

Determined to be the case using {{killall -QUIT eucalyptus-cloud}} to get a thread dump during a sync.  Here it is:
